# Schedule Campaign

# Description

Schedule a campaign at a future date.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Campaign activity ID - Enter the campaign activity ID retrieved from the output of a Create Email Campaign activity. This field supports String type input.
* Scheduled send date - Select the UTC datetime to send the email campaign activity. It autoadjusts to the account's configured timezone. Use the calendar widget to set a date. This field supports DateTimeOffset type input.





* Scheduled send date - Automatically generated output variable.
